title: SKIN SHOP
body: hi i wanna ask you about the skin shop im sitting at the same stupid skin discounts from the start and all my friends got it refreshed .. and i wanna ask when will my reset , how often does it reset?and why only im stil lwith the same ones , is it random?thank you

replies.body: LostFrost offers some solid insight on this!  The reset was caused by an unintended bug.  The items you have now will stay for the remainder of the event.  Sorry for the confusion!

It was only open for like 4 hours on the first day before they shut it down for 2 days and then brought it back online and refreshed the shops.  If yours hasn't "refreshed" it's because you didn't open the "first" one which was giving bugged discounts.

In short, there isn't supposed to be a "refresh."
